page.title: 19COMMON LANE INDUSTRIAL EST.
page.content: The first industrial building we saw was Godiva Industrial Products which had equipment stored in it, but no people and no furniture. A lot of the buildings looked quite old and a few of them looked as if they were shut down. The estate is about 30 years old.There is a board with the names of companies on the estate but we noticed there were more that were not on the board.The factories were very dirty and noisy. Many of them employed just 2 or 3 people but some had quite large workforces.Most were concerned with engineering, but there was an upholsterer and a printer as well as a timber merchants and a swimming pool manufacturer.The biggest factory was Arden Products, an engineering firm. Opposite the estate were three shops and a telephone box.
